entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
